title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message interaction details
description: Describes interaction made by the profile on the message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Interaction Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Specify action made by user on a message.

meta:enum.spam_complaint: Message is marked as spam by the user.
meta:enum.subscription: Subscribe / Unsubscribe to a subscription list.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: The entity in whose context this event is published
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The entity in whose context this event is published

meta:enum.landing_page: Event is related to landing page entity
meta:enum.message: Event is related to message entity

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Tracker URL ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Unique Identifier of the URL clicked by the user.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: URL Tracking Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The tracking type of the URL. It may be `subscription`, or a user-defined category.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Link Tags
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The tags present on this link.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Tracker URL Label
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Human-Friendly label.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Offer Details
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Describes offer(s) involved in a message interaction.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Describes landing pages involved in a message interaction.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Unique Identifier for Landing Page.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Human-Friendly name of landing page.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Type of the Source of Landing Page.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Form Data
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Data filled by the user on the landing page form.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.title: Subscription details.
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Subscription details input by the end user in the landing page.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Subscription Choice for the Subscription List.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: The type of subscription.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Consent details input by the end user in the landing page.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Consent choice for the contact address.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Contact address specified by the subscriber.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/customer.description: Additional data added by the marketer while authoring the landing page.
